name: Void Ravager
description: A terrifying predator of the Void, consuming Light and leaving only darkness in its wake.
lore: <cite>"They do not hunt for hunger. They do not kill for sport. They exist to unmake, to consume, to drag all that shines into the abyss."</cite> â€”Aldric Holloway
combatBehavior: Prefers ambush attacks, jumping to evade retaliation.
